MajorClaims.MC1: television has more positive effects than negative effects
MajorClaims.MC2: I strongly disagree with the statement that television has negative effects on children

Claims.C1: the television can have violent programs
Claims.C2: television has useful and educational programs
Claims.C3: Tv is helpful to relieve our stresses

Premises.P1: if children can use Tv programs wisely, there are more positive effects than negative effects
Premises.P2: it has useful and educational programs and quite helpful to relieve stresses for children
Premises.P3: Not only the up-to-date news, but also there are many programs which has educational purposes
Premises.P4: If children can use those programs wisely, they can learn many information from it
Premises.P5: in Korea, there's program called EBS
Premises.P6: It is targeted for children to teenager
Premises.P7: We can study subjects through EBS lecture
Premises.P8: there are many documentary films such as the life of a great man in Korea
Premises.P9: Using those education programs let people get a lot of inspirations instead of having negative effects
Premises.P10: Many children have a lot of stresses recently
Premises.P11: they have so much pressure about study
Premises.P12: When they are watching sports programs, it's easy to relieve those stresses
Premises.P13: I got too much stress from the school
Premises.P15: After I watch the soccer match between Korea and Japan, the stress was gone
Premises.P16: this soccer match helped me to continue my academic career in the school
Premises.P17: it helped me to relieve my stress
